name: gestcamp
description: GestCamp - Sistema de Gest√£o de Acampamentos e Eventos

scripts.start: echo 'Starting GestCamp server' && python -m http.server 8080 || npx serve .
scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path public)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name public }; Copy-Item index.html public/; Copy-Item styles.css public/; Copy-Item script.js public/; Copy-Item supabase-config.js public/"
